Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces King Guz and his debt to Alley, setting up a minor conflict.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Wet Predicament and Unpaid Debt Scene
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is rescued by Alley, who immediately demands repayment of an old debt.

narrative_arcs.title: King Guz's Wet Predicament and Unpaid Debt

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Purchase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley and a friend's journey to buy a new dinosaur, involving trade-ins and dealership interactions.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Trade-In Consideration Scene
sub_scenes.description: Alley considers trading in his old dinosaur due to its clumsiness.

sub_scenes.title: Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership Scene
sub_scenes.description: Alley and his friend visit Honest Zog's dealership to look for a new dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Compact Dinosaur Test Drive and Deal Scene
sub_scenes.description: Alley test drives a smaller dinosaur and makes a deal despite an unexpected bite.

narrative_arcs.title: Deal Sealed and Zog's Dino's Bite

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to Dinny and Departure Scene
sub_scenes.description: Alley bids farewell to Dinny and departs with the new dinosaur, leaving Dinny at the dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley's Farewell and Mixed Feelings about Dinny
Departure with New Dino & Zog's Advice

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Fate and Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dinny's experience at the dealership and Alley's change of heart leading to a rescue.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Resale Evaluation Scene
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is evaluated by potential buyers, leading to a chaotic test ride.

narrative_arcs.title: Unexpectedly Wild Test Ride on Dinny

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Rescue Scene
sub_scenes.description: Alley learns about Dinny's past and decides to rescue him, leading to a reunion.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley and Coola's Relationship Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays a conflict between Alley and Coola over a fishing invitation and underlying relationship issues.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Rejection and Argument Scene
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Coola fishing, leading to rejection and an argument about being taken for granted, ending with Coola hitting Alley.

Major_Arcs.title: Misogyny and Fishing Commentary
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a series of scenes related to fishing, interwoven with misogynistic commentary and interpersonal conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing and Misogynistic Musings Scene
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen express misogynistic views in separate fishing-related scenes.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Apology by the Riverbank

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rivalry and Misdirected Violence
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores romantic jealousy, leading to misdirected violence and eventual realization.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Competition Accusation and Investigation Scene
sub_scenes.description: A caveman is accused of romantic rivalry, leading to an investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Misdirected Violence and Realization Scene
sub_scenes.description: A violent confrontation occurs due to misdirected jealousy, leading to clarification and realization.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Advice and Failed Sabotage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows romantic advice given and a subsequent failed attempt at romantic sabotage.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Strategy Advice Scene
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss romantic strategies, advising against violence and promoting romance.

sub_scenes.title: Failed Romantic Sabotage Scene
sub_scenes.description: A jealous caveman attempts to sabotage a romantic moment but fails and is insulted.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Infidelity Themes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores various facets of romantic relationships, including misunderstandings, infidelity, and different approaches to romance.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Misunderstanding Scene
sub_scenes.description: A series of scenes depict romantic misunderstandings and accusations.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Interlude and Loss of Control
Clarification of Affection and Misunderstood Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity and Relationship Dynamics Scene
sub_scenes.description: Various scenarios related to infidelity and relationship dynamics are presented.

narrative_arcs.title: Male Camaraderie and Complaint about Women

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes a dance craze, showing its social impact, dangers, and humorous consequences.

sub_scenes.title: The New Twist Dance and Social Pressure Scene
sub_scenes.description: The 'New Twist' dance is introduced, showing its negative physical effects and social pressure to participate.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unfortunate Consequences of the New Twist
Encouragement and Dismissal of the New Twist
Social Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Party

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lesson Scene
sub_scenes.description: A caveman seeks dance lessons for 'The Twitch', resulting in a painful and humorous lesson.

sub_scenes.title: The Twitch Aftermath and Hospital Scene
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of 'The Twitch' is depicted, showing public humiliation and widespread incapacitation.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Twitch Inquiry and Admission of Failure
Fleeing in Fear and Public Humiliation
Hospital Quiet and Watching the Aftermath

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Research and Romantic Mishap
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a time travel experiment for historical research that leads to a romantic mishap.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Setup and Ancient Spain Scene
sub_scenes.description: Time travel is proposed for research, leading to observation of ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Scholarly Inquiry and Time Travel Suggestion

sub_scenes.title: Accidental Time Travel Kiss Scene
sub_scenes.description: A romantic moment in ancient Spain leads to accidental time travel to the present.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Traveler's Successful Tuning and Observation
Romantic Kiss Interruption and Time Travel Activation
Time Travel and Accidental Kiss in the Present

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Assignment and Return Scene
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of accidental time travel, explaining the research assignment and returning to ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Confused in the Present Time Lab
Reassurance and Impending Return to Spain

Major_Arcs.title: Strange Land and Bullfight Prelude
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new character in a strange land and his misadventures leading to a bullfight.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Strange Land and Street Scene Observation Scene
sub_scenes.description: A caveman arrives in a strange land and observes a chaotic street scene.

sub_scenes.title: Street Fight and Matador Revelation Scene
sub_scenes.description: The caveman intervenes in a street serenade, leading to a fight and the revelation of a famous matador.

narrative_arcs.title: The Famous Don and the Disturbance

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Planning and Discussion Scene
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of the street fight leads to bullfight planning and discussion.

Major_Arcs.title: Unconventional Bullfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts an unconventional bullfight featuring the 'brute' and his unorthodox methods.

sub_scenes.title: Unconventional Bullfight Scene
sub_scenes.description: The unconventional bullfight unfolds with audience commentary and the 'brute's' unique approach, leading to victory.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting the Stage for an Unconventional Bullfight

Major_Arcs.title: Alley's Return and Interrupted Kiss
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Alley's return from time travel, anticipated kiss, and humorous interruption due to jealousy.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Return and Interrupted Kiss Scene
sub_scenes.description: Alley returns from time travel, anticipating a promised kiss that is abruptly denied due to jealousy.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Temporary King Ordeal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes the concept of 'King for a Day', showing the temporary king's humorous and chaotic experience.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Setup Scene
sub_scenes.description: The concept of 'King for a Day' is introduced, setting up the temporary kingship.

narrative_arcs.title: Debate on the King's Easy Life

sub_scenes.title: Temporary King Ordeal Scene
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king faces immediate rejection and chaos, leading to a humorous retreat and the original king's return.

Major_Arcs.title: Guz as Temporary King's Humorous Issues
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Guz experiencing comical problems as a temporary king, particularly with Oompa.

sub_scenes.title: Guz as Temporary King's Issues Scene
sub_scenes.description: Guz faces humorous issues as temporary king, including bon-bon mishaps and Oompa's broom attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Lazy Indulgence and Bon-Bon Mishap
Broom Attack and Temporary King Plea

Major_Arcs.title: Clam Dispute and Loss
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a humorous dispute over clams that ends with the clams being lost.

sub_scenes.title: Clam Dispute and Resolution Scene
sub_scenes.description: Characters argue over clams, seek wise counsel, only to find the clams have disappeared.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations of Cheating and Fighting Over Money
Seeking Wise Counsel and Loss of Clams

Major_Arcs.title: King's Lifestyle, Problems and Violence
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays different facets of the King's life, from luxurious dinners to dealing with violence and health issues.

sub_scenes.title: King's Lifestyle and Problems Scene
sub_scenes.description: Scenes depict the King's lifestyle, including ordering investigations, luxurious meals, health concerns, and food fights.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and the Wise Guy's Beating
Fine Advisor's Meal and Self-Serving Thoughts

sub_scenes.title: King's Meal and Sudden Violence Scene
sub_scenes.description: The King's meal continues with ulcer concerns and a sudden, violent outburst from a servant.

Major_Arcs.title: Apology, Liberation and Ruler Proposition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents scenes of apology, liberation from royalty, and a ruler proposition.

sub_scenes.title: Apology and Liberation Scene
sub_scenes.description: Scenes of apology for injury and liberation from royal duties are depicted.

Major_Arcs.title: Barberous Act
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on a humorous 'barberous act' and its reveal.

sub_scenes.title: Barberous Act Scene
sub_scenes.description: A prophecy leads to a 'barberous act' which is revealed to be a barber drumming up business.

narrative_arcs.title: The Barberous Act and the Bearded Stranger

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Roman Soldier
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a time machine experiment and its surprising outcome - the arrival of a Roman soldier.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Experiment Scene
sub_scenes.description: A time machine experiment leads to the unexpected arrival of a Roman soldier, followed by a humorous resolution of a machine malfunction.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Visitor
